SEARCH
Module project.ccprog3mco2gui
Package project.ccprog3mco2gui.model

Class SpecialVendingMachine

java.lang.Object
project.ccprog3mco2gui.model.RegularVendingMachine
project.ccprog3mco2gui.model.SpecialVendingMachine
public class SpecialVendingMachine extends RegularVendingMachine
SpecialVendingMachine is a specific type of vending machine, it extends from the RegularVendingMachine. This vending machine offers additional items such as milk, sweetener, and addons.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • SpecialVendingMachine

      public SpecialVendingMachine(String name)
      The constructor for the SpecialVendingMachine. Calls the superclass constructor and then initializes the additional items this machine offers.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the vending machine.

  • Method Details

    • setStandAloneItemsInv

      public void setStandAloneItemsInv(ItemSlots[] milk, ItemSlots[] sweetener, ItemSlots[] addons)
      Sets the initial inventory for the standalone items in the vending machine. This includes milk, sweetener, and addons.
      Parameters:
      milk - The array of ItemSlots containing the milk items.
      sweetener - The array of ItemSlots containing the sweetener items.
      addons - The array of ItemSlots containing the addons items.

    • setStartingMilkInv

      public void setStartingMilkInv(ItemSlots[] newInventory)
      Sets the starting inventory for the milk items in the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      newInventory - The array of ItemSlots containing the new inventory for milk items.

      Parameters:

    • createItem

      public Item createItem(ArrayList<Item> selectedIngredients)
      Creates a new Item based on a list of selected ingredients. The cost and calories of the new item are determined by the sum of the cost and calories of each ingredient.
      Parameters:
      selectedIngredients - A list of Items representing the selected ingredients.
      Returns:
      A new Item representing the final product.

    • selectIngredient

      public boolean selectIngredient(ItemSlots[] itemSlots, int index, ArrayList<Item> selectedIngredients)
      Selects an ingredient from an array of item slots based on the provided index and adds it to the list of selected ingredients. If the selected ingredient is unavailable or the index is out of bounds, an appropriate message is printed and the method returns false.
      Parameters:
      itemSlots - An array of ItemSlots representing the available items.
      index - The index of the desired item.
      selectedIngredients - A list of Items representing the selected ingredients.
      Returns:
      true if the ingredient was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • revertIngredientQuantities

      public void revertIngredientQuantities(ArrayList<Item> selectedIngredients)
      Reverts the quantity of each selected ingredient. It locates the corresponding slot of each ingredient in the vending machine and increments the quantity by 1. It iterates through the standard slots and the special slots for milk items, sweetener items, and addon items.
      Parameters:
      selectedIngredients - A list of Items representing the selected ingredients to be reverted.

    • hasEmptySlot

      public boolean hasEmptySlot()
      Overrides the hasEmptySlot method from the superclass to include the additional item categories offered by the SpecialVendingMachine. Returns true if there is an empty or unavailable slot in any of the item categories.
      Overrides:
      hasEmptySlot in class RegularVendingMachine
      Returns:
      true if an empty or unavailable slot is found, false otherwise.
